name: Azim, Sentinel of Corduva
description:
One of my first game jam games, this ended up being buggy as hell, but was a really fun experience and I met some really great folks.

It's overwhelmingly unfair, clunky and rough. I love it.

The game had a secret ending if you finished it without absorbing enemy cells. The main character would chop his arm off to end the infection.

Developed for the Global Game Jam 2015 (https://globalgamejam.org/2015/games/azim-sentinel-corduba), in 48h. The jam site location was Córdoba (Andalucía, Spain), and we wanted to feature some part of the city in the game. 

Props to Raul, for making all those amazing sprites in just a few hours.

Team:

  • Fernando Hidalgo
  • Maikel_Ortega
  • megabyte101
  • pronick
  • raulbayushi
